channel.title: Game Frame Help
channel.description:
Hey guys,
I'm having trouble with my Game Frame. I followed Infexis tutorial but I it's not working right... It's hard to explain but I'll do the best I can. So basically, everything is moved over right and all that, but the menus don't work right. Like when you click over to the right more it doesn't work. You have to click more to the left. This wouldn't be too much of a problem if I didn't effect the magic and scroll bars... :I Also, when you click the scroll bar in the chat box the client freezes.
Please help :S
(what happens with the offset buttons) [img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/18329363/Art/gameframeissue.gif[/img]
(error for the scrollbar freezing) [code]Exception in thread "Thread-5" java.lang.ArithmeticException: at client.method65(client.java:3297) at client.drawGameScreen(client.java:8018) at client.processDrawing(client.java:8790) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:108) at client.run(client.java:4539) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)[/code]

item.title: Game Frame Help
item.dc:creator: @runewings317 runewings317
item.description:
@runewings317 wrote:

Hey guys,

I’m having trouble with my Game Frame. I followed Infexis tutorial but I it’s not working right… It’s hard to explain but I’ll do the best I can. So basically, everything is moved over right and all that, but the menus don’t work right. Like when you click over to the right more it doesn’t work. You have to click more to the left. This wouldn’t be too much of a problem if I didn’t effect the magic and scroll bars… :I Also, when you click the scroll bar in the chat box the client freezes.

Please help :S

(what happens with the offset buttons)

(error for the scrollbar freezing)

Exception in thread "Thread-5" java.lang.ArithmeticException: at client.method65(client.java:3297) at client.drawGameScreen(client.java:8018) at client.processDrawing(client.java:8790) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:108) at client.run(client.java:4539) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)

Read full topic
